content: May 5 (OPTA) - Premier League fixtures for this weekend Saturday, May 6 fixtures (BST/GMT) AFC Bournemouth v Chelsea (1500/1400) Manchester City v Leeds United (1500/1400) Tottenham Hotspur v Crystal Palace (1500/1400) Wolverhampton Wanderers v Aston Villa (1500/1400) Liverpool v Brentford (1730/1630) Sunday, May 7 fixtures (BST/GMT) Newcastle United v Arsenal (1630/1530) West Ham United v Manchester United (1900/1800) Monday, May 8 fixtures (BST/GMT) Fulham v Leicester City (1500/1400) Brighton &amp; Hove Albion v Everton (1730/1630) Nottingham Forest v Southampton (2000/1900)
